argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 5 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.c | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. B ) |
| 7 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> D e. B ) |
| 8 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.f | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A |-> C ) ) |
| 9 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.h | |- ( ph -> H = ( x e. A |-> D ) ) |
| 10 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.w | |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) |
| 11 |  | gsummptfsaddOLD.v | |- ( ph -> ( H supp .0. ) e. Fin ) |
| 12 | 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_offval2 | |- ( ph -> ( F oF .+ H ) = ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) = ( F oF .+ H ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) = ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> C ) = ( x e. A |-> C ) |
| 16 | 6, 15 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) : A --> B ) |
| 17 | 8 | #P_feq1d | |- ( ph -> ( F : A --> B <-> ( x e. A |-> C ) : A --> B ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. A |-> D ) = ( x e. A |-> D ) |
| 20 | 7, 19 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> D ) : A --> B ) |
| 21 | 9 | #P_feq1d | |- ( ph -> ( H : A --> B <-> ( x e. A |-> D ) : A --> B ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> H : A --> B ) |
| 23 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. _V ) |
| 24 | 5, 23 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. _V ) |
| 25 | 8, 24 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) |
| 26 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0g ` G ) e. _V |
| 27 | 2, 26 | #P_eqeltri | |- .0. e. _V |
| 28 |  | #P_suppimacnv | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ .0. e. _V ) -> ( F supp .0. ) = ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 29 | 25, 27, 28 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) = ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 30 | 29, 10 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 31 |  | #P_mptexg | |- ( A e. V -> ( x e. A |-> D ) e. _V ) |
| 32 | 5, 31 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> D ) e. _V ) |
| 33 | 9, 32 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> H e. _V ) |
| 34 |  | #P_suppimacnv | |- ( ( H e. _V /\ .0. e. _V ) -> ( H supp .0. ) = ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 35 | 33, 27, 34 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( H supp .0. ) = ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) |
| 36 | 35, 11 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ph -> ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 37 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 18, 22, 30, 36 | #P_gsumaddOLD | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
| 38 | 14, 37 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( x e. A |-> ( C .+ D ) ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) |
